Day 1 (March 11th): Rapid City to Denver, CO (approximately 9 hours and 27 minutes, distance of 998 km)

* Depart from Rapid City in the morning
* Drive to Denver, CO (approximately 9 hours and 27 minutes, distance of 998 km)
* Arrive in Denver in the late afternoon/early evening
* Check into an Airbnb or hotel with entire rooms for the night

Day 2 (March 12th): Denver to Colorado Springs, CO (approximately 1 hour and 9 minutes, distance of 113 km)

* Depart from Denver in the morning
* Drive to Colorado Springs, CO (approximately 1 hour and 9 minutes, distance of 113 km)
* Arrive in Colorado Springs in the late morning/early afternoon
* Check into an Airbnb or hotel with entire rooms for the night

Day 3 (March 13th): Colorado Springs to Alamosa, CO (approximately 3 hours and 40 minutes, distance of 377 km)

* Depart from Colorado Springs in the morning
* Drive to Alamosa, CO (approximately 3 hours and 40 minutes, distance of 377 km)
* Arrive in Alamosa in the early afternoon
* Check into an Airbnb or hotel with entire rooms for the night

Day 4 (March 14th): Alamosa to Rapid City, SD (approximately 9 hours and 27 minutes, distance of 998 km)

* Depart from Alamosa in the morning
* Drive to Rapid City, SD (approximately 9 hours and 27 minutes, distance of 998 km)
* Arrive in Rapid City in the late evening/early night
* Check into an Airbnb or hotel with entire rooms for the night

Budget Breakdown:

* Gas: $160 (assuming an average fuel economy of 25 miles per gallon and a total driving distance of approximately 3,274 km)
* Accommodations: $8,500 (based on an average nightly cost of $112 x 7 nights)
* Food and activities: $6,600 (based on an estimated food budget of $100 per person per day x 7 days = $700, plus an estimated activity budget of $150 per person per day x 7 days = $1,050)

Total budget: $16,300

Note: The above itinerary and budget are just a suggestion, and can be adjusted based on individual preferences and needs. Additionally, the drive times and distances are approximate and may vary depending on traffic, road conditions, and other factors.
